flavorText:
"Few of us left, now. Confounded Yeti have opened all the vents. We'd best hide here with the weapons."
—Perena Deepcutter, Dwarven Armorer

foreignData.name: Zwergische Waffenschmiede
foreignData.text: {2}: Opfere ein Land, um eine +2/+2-Marke auf eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl zu legen. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur während einer Versorgungsphase.

name: Dwarven Armory
originalText: o2: Sacrifice a land to put a +2/+2 counter on target creature. Use this ability only during upkeep.

rulings.text: The ability can be activated during your opponent’s upkeep as well as your own. The upkeep restriction is there to avoid its use during combat.

text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +2/+2 counter on target creature. Activate only during any upkeep step.
